FuncDef:
The delay-measurement sink pm enable command enables delay measurement on a sink interface.
The undo delay-measurement sink pm enable command disables delay measurement on a sink interface.
By default, delay measurement is not enabled on a sink interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To measure an OTN delay, run the delay-measurement sink pm enable command to enable delay measurement on a sink interface.
Precautions
The delay-measurement sink pm enable and loopback { local | remote } commands are mutually exclusive.The delay-measurement sink pm enable and set inner-connection interface commands are mutually exclusive.
